data.title: Mario Lopez and Courtney Mazza Are Engaged
data.meta_description: Mario Lopez and Courtney Mazza, who shared the Broadway stage in the 2006 revival of A Chorus Line , became engaged over the New Year's weekend, according to Extra.
data.text:
Lopez and Mazza, who were engaged in Mexico, are parents to daughter Gia Francesca, who was born on Sept. 11, 2010. (Lopez's first marriage to Ali Landry in 2004 was annulled after two weeks.)

Lopez is best known for his television credits, including "Saved By the Bell" and "Dancing With the Stars," as well as hosting the entertainment news show "Extra" and the MTV reality series "America's Best Dance Crew."
